data.text: Yahweh says, “I want you people to know about my servant, whom I encourage.
He will not show his power by shouting [DOU]
He will not get rid of anyone who is weak like [MET] a smashed reed,
He will not become exhausted or discouraged all during the time that he is causing things to be done justly throughout the earth.
Yahweh our God created the sky
“I, Yahweh, have chosen you
You will enable blind [IDM] people to see,
I am Yahweh; that is my name.
Everything that I have prophesied has happened,
Sing a new song to Yahweh!
You people who live in towns in the desert, sing loudly!
Even people who live on distant islands should honor Yahweh
It will be as though Yahweh will march out like [SIM] a mighty soldier;
He will say, “I have remained silent [DOU] for a long time;
I will level off the hills and mountains,
My people who have been taken to Babylonia are like [MET] blind people,
But those who trust in carved idols,
You Israeli people who have acted toward God like deaf people, listen to what Yahweh says!
No people are [RHQ] as blind as my people, who should have been serving me.
You see and know what are the right things to do, but you do not do them.
Because Yahweh is righteous,
But the armies of Babylon have destroyed Jerusalem and have completely ◄plundered/taken away► [DOU] all the valuable things,
Who among you will listen carefully to these things?
Who allowed the valuable possessions of the people of Israel to be stolen [RHQ, DOU]?
Therefore, he was extremely angry with us,
